posts.post_content:
Looking for low grade Hall of Famers...like the really really low grade super cheap variety in order to help fill out some of my HOF binders.  Ts, Es, Exhibits, Ds, mostly anything.  Graded and raw are both fine.  Probably looking at lower than $50 each hopefully, but may go higher if we are talking bigger HOFers.  Thanks so much!

Jimi


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
